content.question: During 1968 the deep divisions within the American public were demonstrated by all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: the assassinations of Robert F. Kennedy and Martin Luther King, Jr.
urban riots in major cities across the country
antiwar demonstrations at the Democratic national convention in Chicago
the refusal of most Republicans to support Richard Nixon as their presidential candidate
the strong showing of George Wallaceâ€™s American Independent Party in southern states and some northern urban centers

content.answer: the refusal of most Republicans to support Richard Nixon as their presidential candidate

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
